item.title: Thoughts to Words - An Introduction to Aaron Simumba's Website
item.author: simumbaaaron20@gmail.com (Aaron Simumba)
item.description: This post was originally submitted to the Rbind support website. Introduction Hi, my name is Aaron Simumba, and you can find my website on the following URL: https://asimumba.rbind.io/. And on Github, plus you can follow me on Twitter. A brief background about myself: I often like to refer to myself as a “Lost Accountant” - because professionally I trained as an accountant, who lost his way to practise accounting and ended up into the data science space.
